title: Intro to HTML Assignment
description: Create a basic HTML webpage with proper semantic structure including headers, paragraphs, lists, and links. Submit the URL to your deployed page.

title: Intro to CSS Assignment
description: Style your HTML page using CSS. Include external stylesheets, class and ID selectors, and responsive design principles. Submit the URL to your deployed page.

title: Intro to JavaScript Assignment
description: Add interactivity to your webpage using JavaScript. Implement event handlers, DOM manipulation, and basic functions. Submit the URL to your deployed page.

title: Programming Basics Assignment
description: Complete exercises on basic programming concepts including variables, data types, and simple functions. Submit your completed code files.

title: Working in Pairs Assignment
description: Partner with a classmate to solve programming problems collaboratively. Document your pair programming process and submit your solutions together.

title: Lecture 1 in-class Activity
description: Complete the in-class coding exercises from Lecture 1. These exercises reinforce the concepts discussed during class.

title: Lab 1 Assignment
description: Complete Lab 1 exercises focusing on fundamental programming techniques and testing. Submit your code and test cases.

title: Lab 1 Partner Assignment
description: Work with your lab partner to complete collaborative programming exercises. Both partners must submit the assignment.

title: Basics of Partner Programming Assignment
description: Learn and practice pair programming techniques. Complete the guided exercises on effective collaboration and code review practices.
